body.value:
English Video Tutorials
Here you can find the German video tutorials https://dev.labdoo.org/de/content/video-tutorials. The links "Offline local" only work with Labdoo laptops.
Online FTP server: Log-in / user concept Offline local: Log-in / user concept [video:https://youtu.be/roj16dwwS80]
Online FTP server: Educational software / Lubuntu and LXDE Offline local: Educational software / Lubuntu and LXDE [video:https://youtu.be/fuPMJdrYEoI]
Online FTP server: Educational content (OER) / offline wikis Offline local: Educational content (OER) / offline wikis [video:https://youtu.be/2W-VLHfEqQI]
Online FTP server: How to clone a laptop, use Parted Magic and Clonezilla Offline local: How to clone a laptop, use Parted Magic and Clonezilla [video:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GKXJR94QIus]
Online FTP server: Adaption to school / country, language, keyboard, drivers etc. Offline local: Adaption to school / country, language, keyboard, drivers etc. [video:https://youtu.be/iM2UjEiUWik]
Online FTP server: Change system files hosts and hostname Offline local: Change system files hosts and hostname [video:https://youtu.be/ATGl0aHZHAY]
Online FTP server: Installing Lubuntu operating system Offline local: Installing Lubuntu operating system [video:https://youtu.be/nBUgaaHW058]
Online FTP server: How to use scripts / automatic installation of software or content etc. Offline local: How to use scripts / automatic installation of software or content etc. [video:https://youtu.be/aaSgbkCmiJU]
